content: p1tbl until end of row k2tog k1 33 34 35 37 38 43 45 sts rnds 6-8 knit short row shaping repeat rnds 5-8 2 2 2 3 3 4 4 more times 29 row 4 work in est patt until 30 32 34 36 30 31 31 32 35 37 sts 38 38 40 sts rem turn work work in st st until sleeve measures 4 5 5 5 5 row 5 sr work in est patt until 30 32 34 6 6 5 7 9 inches from underarm divide or 36 38 38 40 sts rem turn work 1 5 inches less than desired length or 12 13 row 6 sr work in est patt until 2 sts rem 16 17 18 18 5 23 cm from underarm divide from previous turn or 3 cm less than desired length repeat previous row 3 3 3 5 5 7 7 more times sizes 0-3 mths 6-12 mths 12-18 mths 2-3 next row work in est patt until end of row years 3-4 years only picking up and remembering to knit each double st as a single st as you come to it next round k1 ssk k to end of round 28 30 30 next row work in est pat until end of row 30 32 34 36 sts picking up and remembering to knit each double st as a single st as you come to it ribbed cuff 163 175 191 203 215 223 239 sts change to smaller needles buttonhole rnds 1-8 *k1tbl p1tbl* repeat from * until end of round buttonhole row * k1tbl p1tbl 3 3 3 3 3 bind off loosely 3 4 times k2tog yo* repeat from * to * 4 4 4 4 5 5 5 times in total k1tbl p1tbl k1tbl finishing until marker sm p1 k3 4 6 6 6 6 6 6 times p1 sm k1tbl p1tbl k1tbl until end of block to dimensions and weave in all ends row pay particular attention to the under arm as *next row p1tbl k1tbl pk1tbl until there may be small gaps marker sm k1 p3 4 6 6 6 6 6 6 times k1 sm p1tbl k1tbl p1tbl until end of row add buttons using the button holes as guide next row k1tbl p1tbl k1tbl until marker n a sm p1 k4 4 6 6 6 6 6 6 times p1 sm g i d k1tbl p1tbl k1tbl until end of row* r a repeat from * to * once more c bobble in patt s h b a é m 8
